Detailed Description

UART Parameters.

UART parameters are used to with the UART_open() call. Default values for these parameters are set using UART_Params_init().

See also
UART_Params_init()

Field Documentation

uint32_t UART_Params_t::baudRate

Baud rate for UART

uint32_t UART_Params_t::clockFrequency

CPU Clock Frequency

UART_LEN UART_Params_t::dataLength

Data length for UART

EDMA_Handle UART_Params_t::edmaHandle

Handle to the EDMA Instance. If this is set to NULL the UART driver instance will not use the EDMA events to send and receive data. This is valid only on DSS. Applications need to ensure that the cache contents of the data being transmitted are written back before using the write API.

uint32_t UART_Params_t::isPinMuxDone

Set the flag to indicate if PIN MUX has been completed The driver does not verify if the operation was done correctly. The application is responsible for ensuring that the PIN MUX was done correctly.

uint8_t UART_Params_t::paramSetId

This is the identifier for a PaRAM set which will be used to setup the transfers.

UART_PAR UART_Params_t::parityType

Parity bit type for UART

UART_DataMode UART_Params_t::readDataMode

Type of data being read

UART_Echo UART_Params_t::readEcho

Echo received data back

UART_ReturnMode UART_Params_t::readReturnMode

Receive return mode

uint32_t UART_Params_t::readTimeout

Timeout for read semaphore

UART_STOP UART_Params_t::stopBits

Stop bits for UART

UART_DataMode UART_Params_t::writeDataMode

Type of data being written

uint32_t UART_Params_t::writeTimeout
